summary: This document appears to be a series of law enforcement database query results, likely from a DMV and NCIC check, for an individual named Michael A. Thomas. It shows his driver's license and vehicle registration information, and confirms no active warrants. The query was run on August 19, 2019.

persons.name: Michael A. Thomas
persons.role: Subject of law enforcement database inquiry
persons.context: Individual whose driver's license, vehicle registration, and warrant status were queried by law enforcement via DMV and NCIC systems on August 19, 2019.

events.title: Law Enforcement Database Query on Michael A. Thomas
events.description: A law enforcement agency (potentially USJFELI) conducted a query on Michael A. Thomas through motor vehicle services (DMV) and the NCIC system, retrieving his driver's license details, vehicle registration, and confirming no active warrants.

keyFacts: A law enforcement database query was conducted on Michael A. Thomas on August 19, 2019.
The query retrieved Michael A. Thomas's driver's license information, including that he had an active license, brown eyes, was 5'06", and had a digital photo on file.
The query also retrieved his vehicle registration information for a vehicle with a specific VIN prefix.
A concurrent NCIC (National Crime Information Center) query returned 'NO NCIC WANT', indicating no active warrants for Michael A. Thomas at that time.
The document is a technical printout of database responses, showing the operational details of a law enforcement check.
